name: Principles of Physical Planning
description: Same as Urban Studies 352 (Topic 6). Introductory course in the physical dimension of urban planning. Three lecture hours a week for one semester. Only one of the following may be counted: Community and Regional Planning 369K, Urban Studies 352 (Topic: Principles of Physical Planning), 352 (Topic 6). Prerequisite: For students in the School of Architecture: Architecture 560R with a grade of at least C; for others, consent of instructor.
